title: Starguardian Jinx and Sweetheart Sona fanart~

embed.description: 417 Followers, 214 Following, 104 Posts - See Instagram photos and videos from Lisa (@aoer.art)

body:
https://img00.deviantart.net/6bd1/i/2017/340/f/b/starguardian_jinx_by_aoer-dbvz7sm.png
https://pre00.deviantart.net/c9e3/th/pre/i/2017/333/f/5/sweetheart_sona_by_aoer-dbv9ns8.png

hehe I posted the sona one on the wrong forum so I thought I'd just add it in with this post ^^;

If you wanna see more of my art, feel free to follow me!
Instagram: aoer.art (most active, also my personal insta is unipolarity if you're into that)
Deviantart: aoer
Tumblr: aoer



Feel free to offer suggestions on who to draw next! I have a morgana sketched out but i'm not super happy with it so we will see if I finish it!

replies.body: Draw Nidalee or I'll stab you {{item:1041}}

lmao honestly probably i look the most like ahri just bc she is asian, even then I don't look much like her hahaha
RITO WHERE IS DIVERSITY

Ahhhh >w< it would be nice to see more diversity like we have been getting :3 Taliyah, Illaoi, Jinx(smol bewbs cuz same, and very thin), Zoe? Loli? i guess xD for short girls LOL (though she does look super Disney lol) Ahri's so pretty ;w; i also think Akali is Asian right? but other than that i think that's it, we don't even have a black girl champion either rip XD Illaoi is polynesian so guess that doesn't count ;A; i thought Karma was black for a while but someone told me she's Indian? :o which IS asian but not the idea of "East Asian" but i guess that counts as diverse ^^ p.s. i followed your instagram and ur artstyle is ADORABLE! ;___; {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

ZOE LOLI im dying lmaoooo. honestly i don't like how disney she looks haha Oh yea Akali is too! Yea I think Karma is Indian hahah. I'm pretty sure Karma is a concept that originated in India.  I do think the champions have been getting more unique though! Like Illaoi and Taliyah have very unique looks/body builds.

And thank you so much!! <333
The color palette on Sona! Her eyes! She's beautiful, she's perfect, I'm in love {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

haha I haven't posted anything of the morgana yet~ The sketch is just stored away on my computer : )
and aww thank you!! it's nice to meet someone who is into fgo bc i swear no one i know plays it but me! I'm obsessed. The jeannes are very cool!! I just drew okita bc I was in love with her design before fgo came out, when they made that statue thing? Idk I just remember it was a long time ago and I luckily got her on a single summon ticket! My first SSR haha bc I just started the game during that event.

Nice, congrats on getting your favorite. My first 5* was altera and not from doing the account resets people did. She is an interesting character after having a friend tell me the lore. 

Wish I had that luck when scathach or whatever her name was not long ago the lancer woman. Used all my saved quartz for like 10 of the 30 rolls and got nothing great but "waver" the caster. Forget his real name. Forever hate scathach now since she broke my heart and bank and left my lancer class stuck with a 3* :( 

Okay I'll stop ranting now but drop my friend code here if you like. 615,986,284 

Grants access to a maxed altera saber, maxed Lancelot, soon maxed waver caster, (minus Grail extensions.) And other 4*s being maxed. May your gacha rolls be blessed.
